citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1100 on
19-SEP-16.
The inspector knocked at the door, honked the vehicle horn, called number on file, left a message and waited
half an hour before leaving the premises.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

     The inspector knocked at the door, honked the vehicle horn, called number on file, left a message and waited
